headline: Assessing T. Rowe Price (TROW) Valuation After Leadership Transition Plan And New Advisor Platform Launch
summary: Leadership transition and new advisor tools put T. Rowe Price Group (TROW) in focus T. Rowe Price Group (TROW) is in the spotlight after outlining a long runway for leadership change at T. Rowe Price Investment Management and rolling out new advisor focused portfolio tools with partner Vestmark. See our latest analysis for T. Rowe Price Group. Those leadership and advisor tool updates arrive after a relatively muted period for the stock, with a 90 day share price return of 2.01% and a 1 year...
